track.strDescriptionEN:
"It's Time" is a song by American alternative rock band Imagine Dragons, from the band's major label debut EP Continued Silence as well as their major label debut album Night Visions. The song has reached number 15 on the Billboard Hot 100, making it their first Top 40 single, as well as number four on the Alternative Songs chart and number three on the Rock Songs chart. It holds the longest run on the Billboard Alternative Top 10 for 2012 with 32 weeks. It is the band's most commercially successful song to date and was certified Platinum by the RIAA in November 2012. It was also nominated for Best Rock Video at the 2012 MTV Video Music Awards.

On July 16, 2012, the band performed "It's Time" on The Tonight Show with Jay Leno. They also performed the song live on Jimmy Kimmel Live! on September 4, 2012 and on Late Night with Jimmy Fallon on October 29, 2012 and on Conan on January 9, 2013. The song was also featured in the trailer for the feature film The Perks of Being a Wallflower.
